originalText.text: BEST experience everrr!! Most thorough cleaning I have ever received. Everyone in the office was so pleasant. I especially loved how thorough the hygienist named Kayla is.  Dr. John is very professional and very thorough with his exams. He explaining all the treatment options and made sure i understood everything . Cannot wait to go back for my cleaning and checkup.

text.text: BEST experience everrr!! Most thorough cleaning I have ever received. Everyone in the office was so pleasant. I especially loved how thorough the hygienist named Kayla is.  Dr. John is very professional and very thorough with his exams. He explaining all the treatment options and made sure i understood everything . Cannot wait to go back for my cleaning and checkup.

originalText.text: I have been a patient for many years, the staff, office manager Christina and Dr. John are the absolute best. My visits are quick and painless, appts are kept on time, im never sitting in waiting room (although it is a cozy one).  As for my cleanings, the hygienist is super thorough and gentle.  Soho smile makes my dentist experience a relaxing one and pleasure to keep returning.  Thanks Soho smile!

text.text: I have been a patient for many years, the staff, office manager Christina and Dr. John are the absolute best. originalText.text:
i) overcharged me and my husband by hundreds of dollars caliming dental insurance was issuing smaller amount. Then we cross-checked per chance and caught a discrepancy. SohoSmile agreed to issue a correction, I am *still waiting* for the "check in the mail" weeks later! Cristina has good PR, my first impression was that she is very capable, but it seems they have a clientele for whom $400 plus is no big deal, and hence they can get away with being so cavalier and unprofessional with patient accounts. I have been following up on the 'check in the mail' since weeks now. SohoSmile has refused to reimburse the credit card account that they originally overbilled!

ii) Awful and painful crown fitting since dentist, Dr. John, decided to use less anesthetic during the procedure without even discussing it or explaining it. Then got cranky with me when I called out his failings!

originalText.text:
From the moment I walked into Soho Smile, I knew I was in for a fantastic dental experience. From the welcoming reception area to the state-of-the-art treatment rooms, everything about this dental office exuded professionalism and care.

The staff at Soho Smile are truly exceptional. They greeted me with warm smiles and made me feel comfortable and at ease right away. The receptionist was friendly and efficient, making the check-in process a breeze. The dental assistants were equally attentive, patient and answered all my questions, ensuring I felt fully informed and confident.

Dr. John is undoubtedly one of the best dentists I've encountered. His expertise and professionalism for dentistry are evident in the way he meticulously examined my X-rays and walked me through his professional opinion. He took the time to listen to my concerns and provided me with a comprehensive explanation instead of rushing or pressuring me into making a decision.

I can't say enough good things about Soho Smile. My recent visit was truly an eye opening experience from start to finish. I typically had bad experience with dentist who are more concerned with making money than taking care of their patients, but that was not the case at Soho Smile. I will remain a patient at Soho Smile and do not see myself trusting or going to any other dentist in the future.

If you're looking for a dental office that combines expertise, compassion, and cutting-edge technology, Soho Smile is the place to go. I wholeheartedly recommend this practice to anyone seeking top-notch dental care in a warm and welcoming environment. They have certainly earned my trust and loyalty, and I look forward to my next visit.

originalText.text: The team at Soho Smile is so good, I actually look forward to going to the dentist! Everyone goes out of their way to make me feel comfortable and well-cared for and address my concerns. Not only do they keep my teeth healthy and sparkling, they’ve even offered to help me navigate through my insurance plan options. Compared to experiences I’ve had with other dentists in NYC, Soho Smile is pure heaven. I’m so glad to have found them. You will be, too!
